<a id="class_FileSystemDock"></a>

# FileSystemDock

**Inherits:** [VBoxContainer](class_vboxcontainer.md) **<** [BoxContainer](class_boxcontainer.md) **<** [Container](class_container.md) **<** [Control](class_control.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Redot editor's dock for managing files in the project.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class is available only in [EditorPlugin](class_editorplugin.md)\ s and can't be instantiated. You can access it using [EditorInterface.get_file_system_dock()](class_editorinterface.md#class_EditorInterface_method_get_file_system_dock).

While **FileSystemDock** doesn't expose any methods for file manipulation, it can listen for various file-related signals.

## Signals

<a id="class_FileSystemDock_signal_display_mode_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**display_mode_changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileSystemDock_signal_display_mode_changed)

Emitted when the user switches file display mode or split mode.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileSystemDock_signal_file_removed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**file_removed**\ (\ file\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileSystemDock_signal_file_removed)

Emitted when the given `file` was removed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileSystemDock_signal_files_moved"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**files_moved**\ (\ old_file\: [String](class_string.md), new_file\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileSystemDock_signal_files_moved)

Emitted when a file is moved from `old_file` path to `new_file` path.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileSystemDock_signal_folder_color_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**folder_color_changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileSystemDock_signal_folder_color_changed)

Emitted when folders change color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileSystemDock_signal_folder_moved"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**folder_moved**\ (\ old_folder\: [String](class_string.md), new_folder\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileSystemDock_signal_folder_moved)

Emitted when a folder is moved from `old_folder` path to `new_folder` path.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileSystemDock_signal_folder_removed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**folder_removed**\ (\ folder\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileSystemDock_signal_folder_removed)

Emitted when the given `folder` was removed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileSystemDock_signal_inherit"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**inherit**\ (\ file\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileSystemDock_signal_inherit)

Emitted when a new scene is created that inherits the scene at `file` path.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileSystemDock_signal_instantiate"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**instantiate**\ (\ files\: [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileSystemDock_signal_instantiate)

Emitted when the given scenes are being instantiated in the editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileSystemDock_signal_resource_removed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**resource_removed**\ (\ resource\: [Resource](class_resource.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileSystemDock_signal_resource_removed)

Emitted when an external `resource` had its file removed.

Registers a new [EditorResourceTooltipPlugin](class_editorresourcetooltipplugin.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileSystemDock_method_navigate_to_path"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **navigate_to_path**\ (\ path\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileSystemDock_method_navigate_to_path)

Sets the given `path` as currently selected, ensuring that the selected file/directory is visible.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileSystemDock_method_remove_resource_tooltip_plugin"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_resource_tooltip_plugin**\ (\ plugin\: [EditorResourceTooltipPlugin](class_editorresourcetooltipplugin.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileSystemDock_method_remove_resource_tooltip_plugin)

Removes an [EditorResourceTooltipPlugin](class_editorresourcetooltipplugin.md). Fails if the plugin wasn't previously added.
